Package se.swedenconnect.ca.cmc.api.client

Interface CMCClientHttpConnector

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CMCClientHttpConnectorImpl
    public interface CMCClientHttpConnector
    interface for a connector that is responsible for sending and receiving data from the CA
    Author:
    Martin Lindstr√∂m (martin@idsec.se), Stefan Santesson (stefan@idsec.se)

      CMCHttpResponseData sendCmcRequest​(byte[] cmcRequestBytes, URL requestUrl, int connectTimeout, int readTimeout)
      Sending a request to a CA and getting a CMC response back or relevant error data

    • Method Detail

      • sendCmcRequest

        CMCHttpResponseData sendCmcRequest​(byte[] cmcRequestBytes,
                                   URL requestUrl,
                                   int connectTimeout,
                                   int readTimeout)
        Sending a request to a CA and getting a CMC response back or relevant error data
        Parameters:
        cmcRequestBytes - CMC request data
        requestUrl - URL used to send the request
        connectTimeout - the timeout for http connect specified in milliseconds
        readTimeout - the timeout for reading http data specified in milliseconds
        Returns:
        response data
